changeNote.en-GB: Change Note 2015-08-27: This concept was merged into concept medtop:20000144 as their semantics were not sufficiently different

definition.de: Notfall mit Fahrzeugen im Luft- oder Weltraum
definition.dk: En hændelse, der involverer fartøjer i luft eller rum.
definition.en-GB: Incident involving craft in air or space.
definition.en-US: Incident involving craft in air or space.
definition.pt-BR: Um acidente que envolve uma nave aérea ou espacial.
definition.pt-PT: Um acidente que envolve uma nave aérea ou espacial.
definition.zh-Hans: 涉及飞行器在空中或太空中的事件
